website_summaries.verdict: If you only need a few tools for your grill, this set is a great value with stainless steel and wood pieces.
pros: Despite the low price, these tools are rugged and reliable, and the wooden handles are long and comfortable
There is no carrying case, and the tools are fairly utilitarian in style, but they work well and are likely to last for years
cons: A few customers have noticed defects in the steel but find this and otherwise reliable set

customer_reviews.title: Good tools but poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Good tools but poor quality control. The tongs came with a gouge in the metal and the handle of the brush was missing a large piece of the wood (which they just ignored and stained over). Check the pictures to see what I mean. Other than those quality control issues, the tools are good. The metal is higher quality than expected, after a half a dozen or so uses there is no rust and only minimal wear visible.
customer_reviews.author: emily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality tools
customer_reviews.text: For the low price, I did not expect such good quality. The wood handles are substantial and appear to be well-constructed - no loose rivets, and the tools fit well and are solid. The metal parts are heavy duty; they are advertised as stainless, which they may well be, but they are magnetic, so not the highest quality stainless. All-in-all, these feel solid when I use them and they look nice. I expect to get several years good use out of these and recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: rmwa

customer_reviews.title: This is really a 3-piece set.
customer_reviews.text: The scrub brush started shedding bristles on the second use. Everything else seems fine up to this point, but the grill brush is the worst I've ever used. I will contact their CS and see what they can do about this and then try to remember to update. As of right now though I'd suggest you enter into your purchasing decision that this is really a 3-piece set and that brush is going to be totally useless faster than you can say "weekend bbq!"
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: GARBAGE.
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars, I would. VERY FIRST time I tried to use the brush on the grill, it disintegrated, leaving tufts of wire on the grill surface. I could not be more disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CaliLaw

customer_reviews.title: Super cheap. Any normal griller would be extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap. Any normal griller would be extremely disappointed. The tongs are very flimsy and too long to get any grip, I couldn't even pick up a normal sized chicken breast. The spatula is very tiny, about the width of a post-it note, so anything that isn't a slider size hangs off the side. The grill cleaner is completely wrecked after one use, nearly every wire is completely bent over, no stiffness to them whatsoever. Unless you only grill shrimp on a mini tabletop grill, this product is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Liz B.

customer_reviews.title: They are worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked with how thick and sturdy they actually are. I was expecting something cheaper. However, the brush is already flattened after 1 use, though it does still work. The tongs are a bit awkward because they are too wide open and then they don't close properly. Other than that, its good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Tongs and brush aren’t good enough.
customer_reviews.text: This inexpensive set is hit and miss: it looks nice, is put together well, and some of the pieces function as expected. Two of them, unfortunately, don’t: The tongs - the tongs are too long for the quality of material. If you stick to chicken wings, you’ll be fine. But if you have to flip or move anything larger, the metal bends easily and grips poorly. I rarely use them. The brush - the bristled of the brush are made out of cheap, light material that quickly bends and loses it’s brushing capabilities. Imagine using an animal hairbrush on your grill. The fork and spatula are just fine, but I was really hoping for a better complete set.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Coffin

customer_reviews.title: Good bbq set
customer_reviews.text: Got for my brother, he wanted longer handled tools for bbq. He says they work well, easy to clean, tongues work as they should & hold well. Likes the wood handles
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These are not very well made, very flimsy and not heavy duty at all. Mostly the brush, after 3 uses all of the bristles are bent over and the base is melted. I gambled by buying this on Amazon without being able to touch and feel the product. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WoW Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I gotta say great grilling set ! Comes with everything you need plus it is very well made ! I am very happy with my purchase and yes i would buy again ......
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy Scoob

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for grilling! I accidentally melted one, so make sure they are out of your grill when you start it. But that was my fault, not the products.
customer_reviews.author: Amitch42

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: I gave this an overall rating of 4 because they are not as sturdy as what I was expecting them to be but are not the cheapest made either. Gave them to my daughter for her birthday and she is okay with them.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good tools  - All but the Tongs
customer_reviews.text: Tools set is nice however the tongs are somewhat useless. They cannot grab and hold food because they bend back too much and are too flexible . Just throw the tongs away.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Good set of tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as part of my husband's birthday present. He likes them and they work well. The only negative we can point out is that the tongs don't grip as well as he'd like. So overall, a good product and we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: M_F_2016

customer_reviews.title: Back to basics comes out on top.
customer_reviews.text: I have went through many different tool sets in the past....this set is the best overall. Disregard the fancy names and looks from the other foo foo sets and go for one that delivers. One of the longer sets you will find and the wood is durable...even after it blacked from the heat.
customer_reviews.author: macer

customer_reviews.title: Better tools than I can buy around my town
customer_reviews.text: Better tools than I can buy around my town. Handles are nice finished wood. The tongs are heavy duty enough to lift most things. Throw away the wire brush though.. it looses the bristles and can become embedded in your food.
customer_reviews.author: J. Frank

customer_reviews.title: As I haven't used it yet my opinion doesn't mean much
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet so can't tell how they're going to work but they appear to be sturdy and should work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item came damaged/used. The brush bristles were bent and twisted. A sturdy set but not happy about the condition mine came in when it should have been new.
customer_reviews.author: BMP

customer_reviews.title: Brush falling apart after 3 uses
customer_reviews.text: After 3 uses of the brush, it has already started to fall apart. All of the brush thistles are tearing out. Garbage set. I do not recommend. Spend a few extra bucks and get a better, more durable set.
customer_reviews.author: enovak

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my dad for father's day and I was pleased with them. They look nice and seem to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K's Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great set
customer_reviews.text: Perfect and can't beat the price. Handles are sturdy and long. Perfect starter set as a gift
customer_reviews.author: cvan

customer_reviews.title: Rust
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for less than a year and they are all starting to get rust spots on them even after I've cleaned them immediately after grilling. They are NOT stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: They keep my meat where I put it
customer_reviews.text: They aren't crazy heavy duty but so far they have worked really well. The tongs, I've had to squeeze together a few times as they were spanning a good 12+ inches and we're not cooking half-cow's on the grill. So far, we've had them a few weeks and have used them at least 7 times without issue. I'm a little weary of the rivets staying clear of rust. I'll withold final judgement for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Vance

customer_reviews.title: Great grill accessory set, this set has it all for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: These are all well made, wooded handles, and they feel good in the hand, totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Good set for grilling.
customer_reviews.text: The cooking tools are very well built and I like them a lot. The only reason this is 4 stars instead of 5 is because the bristles on the wire brush are falling off after only a couple of uses. That is ok though because I expected that to happen and bought the set for the other parts. The spatula, tongs and fork are great!
customer_reviews.author: Ctab85

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent looking but very cheap set. The tongues don't properly grip anything more than 1/2 inch thick. Literally had to use my fingers instead to get a pork tenderloin on the grill. The brush handle is very soft, bending when cleaning the grill. Likewise, the brush head got deformed after a single use. Don't fall for the wooden handles like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: These utensils worked great on vacation. I needed some new ones. I particularly like the length of each one.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret G Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Ok set
customer_reviews.text: This set is ok. Everything is smaller than it should be. That’s the only problem with it
customer_reviews.author: Tim Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Do You Know A Grill Master?
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect birthday gift for my fiancée; who prides himself on his grilling abilities. These utensils are sturdy and excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set looks good but are thinner material than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Set looks good but are thinner material than expected. Tongs are quit flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: MJB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I didn't have a set, and was using regular kitchen utensils. This set did the trick!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BARGAIN BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: I got so stoked when it came in the mail. I was very impressed with how ridiculously cheap they were for such good quality. The wooden handle is classic. The metal part is sturdy. Looks like it's pretty heavy duty. I'll probably write another review once summer ends to keep people posted about how these babies handled. One thing for sure is it would cost over $30 in stores.
customer_reviews.author: pickly1005

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: These tools are good. So far these have worked well. The brush was great at cleaning off my grids.
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: would not pay more than $17
customer_reviews.text: not the best quality but it works. not worth more than the listed price of $17
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: They've held up very well all summer grilling season. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: S & T Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Utensils
customer_reviews.text: Like the set not happy with the tongs they are hard to maneuver keep close and grab things the other utensils are well made easy to use
customer_reviews.author: brandi

customer_reviews.title: Holds up in the rain
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable and held up in around heat and rain. Glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: BBQ tools
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent set of tools, the wood handles are a bit cheap though. Other than that, everything works as it should.
customer_reviews.author: Chaotic

customer_reviews.text: 2.5 stars due to the fact that half of this set is good. The fork and the spatula are fine. The tongs are on the thin side and were a little too bendy with the weight of a small Tri-Tip. The brush, needs more bristles and needs to be more course. I haven't had the problem of the bristles falling out like others had, but they are not course enough, and too thin to scour a grill well.
customer_reviews.author: Wubalubba

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff at a Good Price
customer_reviews.text: The tool set is simple, heavy, apparently well made and inexpensive. It arrived at sonic speed, less than two days.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Durable, big and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I like how bit this set is and how strong the material and craftsmanship was.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Khun

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set to go with my new BBQ. The spatula and fork are exactly what you would expect them to be and work just fine. The tongs however went right into the garbage can. The metal is so soft that if you try to pick up more than a cotton ball they will not hold on to it. I have restaurant quality tongs already and those are what I will continue to use. The wire brush is very soft and will probably not last very long. I should have just gone to a local store and made this purchase. Then again it was under $20 so I got what I paid for I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Jon H.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t even use these utensils for 5 minutes. They are super flimsy and bend. The tongs have no grip strength. The brush bristles are terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Estochen

customer_reviews.title: Great for barbecues!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for anyone that likes to barbecue. Good quality, especially for the price. I bought this set for Father’s Day, but now my husband wants one too!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Everything else is great. Would suggest to anyone who occasionally grills
customer_reviews.text: Durable and well made for the price. I've used these a couple times a week for 3 months and the only complaint I have is the shallow bristles on the brush. Everything else is great. Would suggest to anyone who occasionally grills. Serious grillers should look for a higher quality grill brush.
customer_reviews.author: ROFLwaffle

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere for a better set! Mine fell apart on the first usage
customer_reviews.text: Look elsewhere for a better set! Mine fell apart on the first usage.
customer_reviews.author: John Galt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty flimsy stuff - I would probably upgrade if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty flimsy stuff - I would probably upgrade if you buy some. The seller was fine though 5 Stars to them
customer_reviews.author: Glen Stuhlmacher

customer_reviews.title: Great product great price
customer_reviews.text: I just got a grill and was looking for some grilling utensils with a budget, these utensils are not just durable but look stylish as well. They clean easy and do not get too hot when exposed to the flame. I don't need to wear gloves with these utensils.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: decent value
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality at a reasonable price. I keep these tools at our campsite and have used them a few times. They are sturdy and do the job. Nothing super special about them, just a lower cost set that seems reasonably durable so far.
customer_reviews.author: VelocityTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews before me but I went ahead and bought it. The brush is ok. All you have to do is not scrub hard to make it last. The tongs have some give but I have no problems fliping 1lb steaks. The spatula and forks are sturdy and awesome.
customer_reviews.author: MechJT

customer_reviews.title: Wish I didnt buy these!
customer_reviews.text: The tongs are so flimsy they are almost unusable. Even chicken legs bend them. Terrible, cheap set! I'd recommend people just buying the $8 set from the super market over this, at least the tongs will be usable!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T

customer_reviews.title: Goog enough for grilling.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the grill nothing spectacular great for a basic grill bbq set. Tongs work well cleaning brush holds up better than black plastic models I see and used from the store. Wood handles are comfortable. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great set and customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had an incomplete set sent to me but they quickly sent me the missing piece. Their customer service is great! The tools are wonderful the only I would say could be better is the cleaning brush. After one use I felt like we needed a new one.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Good for grilling.
customer_reviews.text: These are a nice set of grill tools, and they are very reasonably priced. Some reviewers said they had problems with the cleaning brush falling apart but I have used it a handful of times and it works fine and hasn't come apart at all.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Bryant

customer_reviews.title: These are good quality and price
customer_reviews.text: These are good quality and price. They are big in size. I have an apt. and small patio where I grill on occasion on a small grill and these are designed for a bigger grill and maybe person! However, they are a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Joz

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money. To say this is cheaply made is an over statement. You would do better going to the dollar store to purchase these items.
customer_reviews.author: biggfn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a cool out and easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: The second spatula works fine!
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything but the cleaner. I immediately removed the bristle block and turned it into another spatula.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Dale

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Bristles on the brush r completely smushed after cleaning a brand new grill twice. Tongs are difficult to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good except for the tongs
customer_reviews.text: Every good except for the tongs. They are somewhat awkward to use and hard to pinch your food and flip with. Other than that, everything else is very good.
customer_reviews.author: tomato

customer_reviews.title: The handles are also nice and long for safer grilling
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the quality of this barbecue set. The handles are also nice and long for safer grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Raisin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Great tools. Look sharp (nice). Easy to use and wash. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John Toth Jr

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy Tong
customer_reviews.text: Tongs are useless. Threw them across the backyard. They are still in the bushes I think...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long...
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. Cleaning brush didn’t even hold up after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's Day gift and my fiance really likes it. Heavy-duty and seems to hold up well. We are very satisfied with this Grill set.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie barbe

customer_reviews.title: The pieces are pretty good but the tongs are crap
customer_reviews.text: The pieces are pretty good but the tongs are crap. They are flimsy and you can't pick anything up with them.
customer_reviews.author: jenni

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy. You can hardly pick up anything with the tongs and the two-prong. I gave it two stars because the brush and cleaner works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Paul R.

customer_reviews.title: not a happy cooker.
customer_reviews.text: spend a few dollars and get something with some back bone ! not a happy cooker.
customer_reviews.author: David T.

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: They packaged the brush better so it was not bent. The tongs are just a little weak. But over all a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Tongs will pick up zilch
customer_reviews.text: The tongs will not grip anything, chicken and burgers slide right out
customer_reviews.author: Stanley W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I got thwae for my grandpa. He will love them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for us
customer_reviews.text: We returned these, the quality was too poor for what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good set
customer_reviews.text: Good set, if it was stuffier it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: YS

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as a first Fathers Day gift to ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as a first Fathers Day gift to go along with a barbeque. He really likes them and they have so far held up to quite a bit of use.
customer_reviews.author: katharine

customer_reviews.title: Great pieces for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought a second set for our son! Great pieces for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bieger

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of tools for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of tools. They look and feel solid. Wood looks nice and does not splinter like some of the other cheaper tools. Stainless is nice and bright.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Reece

customer_reviews.title: but Ive been camping twice with these and I love them.
customer_reviews.text: the previous comments make me laugh. Of course the metal is light duty, but Ive been camping twice with these and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Moose

customer_reviews.title: Essential tools to BBQ season! Get them!
customer_reviews.text: These are the essential pieces to your summer BBQ season. The price and quality are both perfect. I use them almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Chris del ValleTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: These do the Trick and Very well at that
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived fast, well packaged and top quality for the price. Gifted it to my daughter. She loves to be a the forefront of Barbecuing and taking the reins of master cook on the grill like her Dad.
customer_reviews.author: Steven, Sedona AZ

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice looking and sturdy barbecue utensils. I purchased a magnetic hanger with hooks to put on the side of my barbecue, so I can hang the utensils within easy reach.
customer_reviews.author: Jude

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and high quality...
customer_reviews.text: These grill tools are sturdy and high quality. I had been concerned about the quality given the low price, but these are very high quality for the bargain price. I am pleased with this set.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Murray

customer_reviews.title: Can’t hold anything
customer_reviews.text: The metal is to flimsy to hold meat, the handle feels nice in your hand though.
customer_reviews.author: Norrea rocha

customer_reviews.title: High quality set
customer_reviews.text: Love the set. Wish the tongs had a leather strap to hang from the grill like the others. Good quality for the price. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: IanFlemingFan

customer_reviews.title: The pincers are useless - they don't have the strength to grip and ...
customer_reviews.text: Long, but flimsy. The pincers are useless - they don't have the strength to grip and hold anything.
customer_reviews.author: CAReaderGirl

customer_reviews.title: Bad wire brush
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the wire brush was bad, I only used for 2times and all the wires are worn out already.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Tongs are flimsy!
customer_reviews.text: All around this is a good set but there are 2 things that I don't like: - the tongs are not stiff enough but very flimsy and long which makes it difficult to pick up and move meat on the BBQ - all of the pieces are very long which makes storage difficult in our drawers, which to my knowledge are of standard depth
customer_reviews.author: R. Jordan Cools

customer_reviews.title: Crappy product
customer_reviews.text: Everything in this sucks except the spatula. The grill cleaner started falling off after three uses. Very cheap price and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: jared

customer_reviews.title: They do what they need them to do
customer_reviews.text: Well made for their price the handles have held up and the tools haven't melted so that's always a plus
customer_reviews.author: Josiah

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality I was pleasantly surprised! Real wood handles and good size super sturdy! Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This toolset has been great, it's quality and has stood up to even being left outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Tongs not hinged and tiring to use. Will replace next year with Weber that I later saw at a store.
customer_reviews.author: PCW47

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal!!
customer_reviews.text: The handles are long so you don’t have to get close to the flames. Easy to clean and not at all flimsy!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Brush fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: Brush fell apart within a few weeks. Otherwise set is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Todd L. Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality products, easy to clean, and they look nice displayed next to our grill.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Works great, Grill Brush great
customer_reviews.text: Grill Brush is great, no pieces of wire came off and used all summer. Better Brush than the Weber Brand name brush
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: It is great buy for the great value
customer_reviews.text: It is great buy for the great value. We recently bought a new grill, so we wanted to replace our grill utensils to give its complete new look of our new grill. As soon as receiving this utensils, we grilled stuff and had a chance to use them. They worked as expected and felt pretty durable. So far we are loving them!
customer_reviews.author: Mini

customer_reviews.title: Nice heavy duty tools but the poorly designer tongs are ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty tools but the poorly designer tongs are worthless. You can't pick anything up with them, they bend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size good value
customer_reviews.text: These are well made and large which are nice for handling around the hot grill. They look well made.
customer_reviews.author: Donald J.

customer_reviews.title: great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap enough to leave outside in the bar, great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dorliska69

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to clean and hung nicely on our grill.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

product_meta.title: New Star Foodservice 59007 Stainless Steel BBQ Tool Set with Solid Hard Wood Handles, Set of 4
feature_bullets: 4-Piece stainless steel barbecue tool set includes: tong, spatula, cleaning brush, and fork
Made of heavy duty high grade Stainless Steel with solid hard wood handle
Commercial quality brazed Stainless Steel rivets for durable long lasting
Leather straps to hang on grill hooks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars493 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
